sections.text: 17b-490.Section 17a-341. (Formerly Sec. 17-511). - Pharmaceutical Assistance Advisory Board.Section 17a-342 to 17a-349. - Transferred to Chapter 319ff, Secs. 17b-491 to 17b-498, inclusive.Section 17a-350 to 17a-359. - Reserved for future use.
